text: Arau jannatisakale jahannamisakalaka sambodhana karai ka’ba, ‘amara pratipalake amara lagata yi pratisrauti karaichila seya ami samcakaiye pa'icho. Kintu tomalokara pratipalake tomalokaka yi pratisrauti dichila seya tomaloke samcakaiye pa'ichane? Sihamte ka’ba, ‘haya’. Tara pichata ejana ghosanakaraiye sihamtara majata ghosana karai ka’ba, ‘yalimasakalara oparata allahara lanata
